colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES DPAL GYI RI BO'I GNAS BDAG DAR KHAM GOS CAN GYI GSOL MCHOD KUN PHAN 'DOD 'JO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^DGON GNAS 'DI'I GDAMS 'DZIN PA'I BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN 'JIGS BYED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GNAS BDAG 'DI NI DGON GNAS GNYIS LA SKU DRIN CHE BAR BSAM NAS, 'CHAM GYI GRAS SU 'DZUGS 'DUN YOD SKABS, DON GNYER CAN 'GAS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS TSUL LTAR BRIS PA'O,, ,,DGE MTSAN 'PHEL LO, ,)
